snippet.title: MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer for "MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA" has been released.
This game is scheduled for world-wide release on PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Xbox One in 2021 in Japanese, English, Chinese (Traditional/Simplified), and Korean. *Voice acting is in Japanese only.

Official Twitter → https://twitter.com/MB_LUMINA​
Official website → https://meltyblood.typelumina.com/en/
